thread.title: Mathieu Wattenij

author: Mathieu Wattenij
title: Mathieu Wattenij
text:
Had painfull bowels.. the area under the lower left ribcage.
Woke up at night with pain and this always on the same area.. i started to think it might be some bowel disease or even C.
My thoughts got scary and my overall being suffered..
Started to take CBD to ease pain and thoughts... it helped wonders and even the pain is fading away.. i have an appointment with stomac-bowel specialist next week.. by then it might be cured? I will feel rediculous to show up with no pain or symptons. I learned more about the benefits of CBD and will continue taking it as a supplement!
To mention i do use the Endoca 3% Raw hemp oil.
